mapper.select: SELECT id, title, type FROM zhousb_blog WHERE id < #{id} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, title, type FROM zhousb_blog WHERE id > #{id} AND type = #{type} LIMIT 1

SELECT title, zhousb_blog.type, system_dict_data.label typeLabel, content, remark, pv, gmt_create FROM zhousb_blog LEFT JOIN system_dict_data ON zhousb_blog.type = system_dict_data.`code` AND system_dict_data.dict_key = 'blog_type' WHERE state = 0 and zhousb_blog.id = #{id}
